summary: This is an email exchange between U.S. Attorney's Office personnel discussing the resolution of the Epstein case and a message from attorney Ted Leopold. The sender congratulates the recipient on the case outcome, noting Epstein's jailing resulted from their dedication. Leopold reportedly represents three girls and was happy with the news.
